tool_description: Calculates comprehensive payment processing fees including gateway fees, interchange rates, and additional charges based on transaction characteristics.

card_type.description: Card type if applicable (visa, mastercard, amex, discover)

merchant_category.description: Merchant category code for fee calculation

volume_tier.description: Merchant volume tier (low, medium, high, enterprise)

error_messages: Invalid payment method: Payment method not supported for fee calculation
Unsupported gateway: Gateway not found in fee structure database
Invalid merchant category: Merchant category code not recognized
Card type mismatch: Card type required for card payment methods
Amount too low: Transaction amount below minimum fee calculation threshold
usage: Provide transaction details including amount, currency, payment method, merchant category, and gateway. Optionally specify card type, transaction type, and other modifiers for accurate fee calculation.
